- iOS main app + keyboard extension
- Real-time audio capture with waveform visualization
- Secure API key storage via Keychain
- App Groups IPC for keyboard-app communication
- 75 unit tests passing

Architecture:
- TypelessCore: Shared business logic \(Swift Package\)
- TypelessUI: Shared UI components \(Swift Package\)
- iOS App with voice recording view
- iOS Keyboard Extension with QWERTY + Pinyin layouts
EOF
\)")
